title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 57.1 - Title and citation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 57.1 - Title and citation

State Regulations

Within and for the purposes of the Department of Labor, this Part (rule) may be known as Industrial Code Rule No. 57, relating to
hazards to untrained persons working or moving materials or equipment in
proximity to high-voltage power lines. It may be cited as Code Rule 57 High

Voltage Proximity as an alternative and without prejudice to its designation
and citation established by the Secretary of State. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
57.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
